text: A limeade cocktail is a cocktail that has limeade as an ingredient. ==Examples== ===Trios=== *Cherry amaretto limeade (amaretto, cherry juice, limeade) *Watermelon Jolly Rancher frozen margarita (Jolly Rancher Infused Tequila, lime juice, simple syrup)https://tipsybartender.com/recipe/watermelon-jolly-rancher-frozen- margarita/ ===Others=== *Beer limeade (light-colored beer, water, ice, salt, cayenne pepper, frozen limeade concentrate) *Gin limeade (gin, simple syrup, club soda, lime juice) *Mermaid limeade (coconut rum, blue curaçao, lime juice, club soda, limeade) *Planter's Punch (dark rum, lime juice, simple syrup, grenadine, Angostura bitters, soda water)https://www.liquor.com/recipes/planters-punch/ *Strawberry key limeade cocktail (made with strawberry vodka, Champagne, water, sugar, strawberries, and key lime juice). *Vodka limeade punch (vodka, triple sec, club soda, and thawed limeade concentrate), *Vodka mint limeade (vodka, mint leaves, water, honey or sugar, limes) ==References== Category:Cocktails with limeade
title: Limeade cocktail
